member.name: M:StockMarket.Api.Controllers.StocksController.QueryStocksWithXDocument(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Retrieves all stocks, filters them using XDocument (LINQ to XML), and returns stocks with price greater than a specified value. Requires authentication.
member.param: The minimum price to filter stocks by (e.g., 100). Default is 0.
member.returns: An XML feed containing filtered stock data.
